title: New: Space Cubs – Why Are You Resisting? (You Know You’re From There)
content:
Photo: Courtney Denk

Well this is rather special. Buffalo’s Space Cubs aka Suzanne Bonifacio released a trio of tracks throughout last year, all glitchy, slightly lo-fi freak-pop jaunts, thriving upon their raw production elements, and her unique vocals. Now, six months down the line and Bonifacio is back with a double AA single of sorts, the stunning Why Are You Resisting? (You Know You’re From There) and the equally as complex Midtime Disguise. Opening as a rather unsettling, Bjork meets Grimes, atmospheric number, Why Are You… then blossoms elegantly into a wonderfully self-assured, dream-pop gem, complete with a vaguely XX drum section (wait for 2.30ish… trust me).

‘You, you held your calm, while I was on the line, all dishevelled, just like yesterday’

Check out Why Are You Resisting? (You Know You’re From There) below, and if that floats your boat, then try out Midtime Disguise underneath that.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
